title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef served in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and ginger.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm with vanilla ice cream.

title: Mediterranean Salad
summary: Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil dressing.
